name: Connections (itch)
description:
Right-click on the character and drag to move between pivots

Click on the sun icons in the bottom-left to change the time of day

In-person connections form automatically and can't be broken

Click on the character and drag to a person to form an online connection

Hold the right-mouse button and swipe through an online connection to break it

The heart above each person indicates the happiness you will gain from connecting with them

Fill the hearts in the bottom-right to complete a level

Having 4 or more online connections will make them negatively affect happiness

Having 6 or more in-person connections will make them negatively affect happiness

Move onto a blue pivot to study

Press P to skip a level and R to reset
